product_name: Point 65 Martini GTX Kayak - Center Section
long_description: The Point 65 Martini GTX Kayak Center Section combines with the Martini GTX Solo Modular Kayak (sold separately) to form a tandem kayak so you can take a friend along. Innovative system joins pieces together, creating a stable, rigid kayak that you'll love to paddle in light surf, calm rivers and flatwater. Assembly happens in a flash: just align the sections, feed a strap into a ratchet, and ratchet down straps on either side of the cockpit. The Martini GTX stands up to rough treatment thanks to a UV-resistant, single-layer polyethylene hull. Equipped with a comfortable AIR seat with backrest; seat cover is made of durable, comfortable honeycomb-patterned material with meshlike fabric that's laminated over EVA foam. Bungee cords offer storage, and "Fish-O-Meter" hash marks on hull measure your catch. The Point 65 Martini GTX Center Section includes a paddle keeper and recessed cup holders.
short_description: The Point 65 Martini GTX Kayak Center Section combines with the Martini GTX Solo Modular Kayak (sold separately) to form a tandem kayak so you can take a friend along.
